message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.text.DecimalFormat' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.utils.Utils'.

Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.logging.Level' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.thebridge.utils.Utils'.
